label.h3: What can be done with a Dashboard in DHIS2?

choice.span: A. View the charts, pivot tables, and maps most frequently used.
B. Enter data directly to any output.
D. Readily share information with others.
E. Establish a routine for regularly checking key program aspects.

div.p: With a Dashboard, you can view the charts/tables/maps you use most frequently; quickly monitor program progress; readily share information with other users and user groups, and establish a routine for regularly checking key program aspects. Data cannot be entered through the Dashboard.
